blogs.title: Repeating the same joke until it becomes funny
blogs.body: Some jokes are not funny the first time, or the second time, but repeating them enough eventually turns them into comedy gold. Or at least into shared suffering.
blogs.author: Max

blogs.title: Why jokes are funnier when you shouldn't laugh
blogs.body: The moment you are in a serious situation is exactly when a joke becomes irresistible. Trying not to laugh somehow makes everything ten times funnier.
blogs.author: Liam
